entry.title: Galaxy S8 Plus Case Terra Guard Series
entry.summary:
Vendor: VRS Design
Type: Galaxy S8 Plus Cases
Price: 34.99

Work Hard, Play Harder
The Terra Guard Galaxy S8 Plus case provides an all-around line of defense against hard drops onto any terrain. Reinforced with a TPU body and corners under a sturdy PC back, don't be afraid to take your phone along next time you venture out.
_
PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS
Device Galaxy S8 Plus
Dimensions 6.63" x 3.15" x 0.51"
Weight 1.76 oz
Material Polycarbonate, Thermoplastic Polyurethane
